message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $140. This is a special deal considering its value to you is $150.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $130?
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to consider a price of $135 for the product. Please let me know if this works for you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value I place on your product, I would like to propose a price of $130. I hope this meets in the middle for us.
